summary: This bill, the Transportation Equity Act, mandates the establishment of a Transportation Equity Committee within the Department of Transportation. The committee will advise the Secretary on transportation equity issues, including developing a strategic plan with national transportation metrics, and evaluating the department's work in connecting people to opportunities. It outlines the committee's structure, meeting frequency, membership requirements (including diverse representation), and the responsibilities of a designated federal officer. The act also specifies that the Federal Advisory Committee Act will apply, excluding section 14.
